General.Name: Bit Brother Ltd
General.Description: Bit Brother Limited engages in the specialty tea product distribution and retail business in the People's Republic of China and the United States. The company offers tea-based beverages, including fresh milk tea, fruit tea, milk cap tea, etc.; light meals comprising salads, sandwiches, pasta, steak, burritos, and other healthy options; and pastries consisting of fresh baked bread, fresh baked cakes, frosting cakes, etc. As of June 30, 2022, it operated three tea shops, including two flagship and one general stores in the Hunan province, the People's Republic of China. The company was formerly known as Urban Tea, Inc. Bit Brother Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.
